about.title: 35+ Years of Creating Unforgettable Thai Experiences
about.description1: Rising Sun was founded in 1988 by Md Salim Jahangir, who had a vision to share the authentic beauty and culture of Thailand with travelers from around the world. What started as a small local guide service has grown into a full-service travel company with deep local connections throughout Thailand.
about.founderQuote: Our mission is to showcase the real Thailand through the eyes of locals.
about.description2: Unlike large international agencies, we offer a personal touch with the insider knowledge that only comes from decades of local experience. Every itinerary is crafted with care, attention to detail, and a deep understanding of what makes Thailand special.
about.journeySubtitle: Milestones from our 35+ years in Thai tourism

1988.title: Humble Beginnings
1988.description: Rising Sun was founded as a small local guide service in Bangkok.

1995.title: Expansion to Northern Thailand
1995.description: Opened our first office in Chiang Mai to provide services in Northern Thailand.

2005.title: International Recognition
2005.description: Awarded 'Best Cultural Tour Operator' by Tourism Authority of Thailand.
